name: create-full-app
description: Provide single node.js server with popular ssr and web framework
author: keyboard3

scripts.build: esbuild index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --platform=node && cp -r templates dist/ && cp package.json dist/
scripts.dev: esbuild index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --platform=node --watch && cp -r templates dist/ && cp package.json dist/
